metadata.dc:author: Parri, F J
Sancho, M A
Raigosa, J M
Lerena, J
Cacéres, F
Muñoz, M E
metadata.dc:description: Palate necrosis as a consequence of palate infection it's an exceptional condition about there's not too much references at literature. We present a case of a 6 months old child who present a palatal necrosis after a supurative medial otitis that involved hard and soft palate, with positive culture for Pseudomona aeruginosa causing a almost complete absence of the palate that simulate a bilateral palatal cleft.
metadata.dc:title: Necrosis palatina en el lactante. A propósito de un caso.
[Palatal necrosis in children. Case report].
metadata.dc:publisher: Cirugia pediatrica : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Cirugia Pediatrica
